publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5689 Kenneth Gibson: Idling Engines—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Government to encourage all local authorities to follow the lead of Glasgow City Council in enacting bylaws to fine drivers who keep their engines running and considers that such idling causes unhealthy fumes and pollution and contributes to unnecessary CO2 production.

S3M-5689 Idling Engines (lodged on 8 February 2010) Bill Kidd*, Mike Pringle*, Pauline McNeill*, Alasdair Allan*, Bob Doris*, Anne McLaughlin*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Willie Coffey*, Jackie Baillie*, Bill Wilson*, Aileen Campbell*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-5689 Idling Engines (lodged on 8 February 2010) Robin Harper*
